title: Commemorating the Good Shepherd Fairview Home upon the occasion of its 140th Anniversary
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commemorating  the  Good Shepherd Fairview Home
upon the occasion of its 140th Anniversary

WHEREAS, In the course of the evolving development of this Empire State,
when the ingredients of shared concern and responsive  endeavor  combine
in  commitment to community, there emerges among the distinguished citi-
zenry of the State of  New  York,  certain  institutions  which  warrant
special recognition; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly  proud  to  commem-
orate  the  Good  Shepherd  Fairview Home upon the occasion of its 140th
Anniversary; and
  WHEREAS, The year 1870 marked the founding of the Episcopal  House  of
the Good Shepherd, followed by the 1891 establishment of the Presbyteri-
an Home of the Aged Women, which would later be named the Fairview Home;
and
  WHEREAS,  The two homes merged at the current Fairview Avenue location
in 1968 to form Good Shepherd Fairview Home; and
  WHEREAS, Located in a quiet residential  neighborhood,  Good  Shepherd
Fairview Home at Binghamton has offered housing and health care services
for  nearly  140 years; Good Shepherd Fairview is a not-for-profit resi-
dential healthcare community that  offers  various  levels  of  care  to
accommodate  individual  needs, including: 40 apartments for independent
living; 41 adult care facility rooms; 32 assisted living program  rooms;
34 skilled nursing facility beds for long-term care and two respite care
beds; and 20 private rooms for short-stay rehabilitation; and
  WHEREAS,  It is the sense of this Legislative Body that when organiza-
tions of such noble aims and accomplishments are brought to  our  atten-
tion,  they  should  be celebrated and recognized by all the citizens of
the great State of New York; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
commemorate  the  Good  Shepherd  Fairview Home upon the occasion of its
140th Anniversary; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the Good Shepherd Fairview Home.
